alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Shelby (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 12:14PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern DeSoto, northwestern Marshall, southwestern Fayette and southeastern Shelby Counties through 1245 PM CDT... At 1213 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Olive Branch, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Collierville, Germantown, Olive Branch, Memphis, Mt Pleasant, Slayden, Piperton, Rossville, Cayce, Fairhaven, Elba, Canadaville, Handy Corner, Taska, Kirk, Miller, Cedarview and Hickory Withe. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
